metadata.name: Overcome Curses
metadata.description:
[h1][b]Overcome Curses[/b][/h1] Simple mod that deactives curses (minus Labyrinth, because you know...) once the floor boss is killed.
[h2][b]Now configurable![/b][/h2]
Overcome Curses now supports [url=steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787] !! Mod Config Menu Pure [/url]
If you are a fan of using the debug menu, you can also configure the mod that way, simply check it out by typing:
[code]overcome help[/code]
[h2][b]If you have Feedback or feature requests, feel free to contact me![/b][/h2]
